ExternalData.Titlesect: International Convention Against the Taking of Hostages

TreatyText.Label: Text
TreatyText.Text: United Nations, Treaty Series , vol.?316, p.?05; and depositary notifications C.N.209.1987.TREATIES-6 of 8 October 1987 and C.N.324.1987.TREATIES-9 of 1 February 1988 (procès-verbal of rectification of the original Russian text).

TreatyNote.Text: The Convention was adopted by resolution 34/1461 of the General Assembly of the United Nations dated 17 December 1979. It was opened for signature from 18 December 1979 to 31 December 1980.
